sqlMap.insert: insert into tb_user (id, pwd, name, phone, email, regdate, completed_todo, uncompleted_todo) values (#id#, #pwd#, #name#, #phone#, #email#, now(), 0, 0)
sqlMap.select: select no, id, pwd, name, phone, email, regdate, completed_todo, uncompleted_todo from tb_user where id = #value#
sqlMap.update: update tb_user set uncompleted_todo = uncompleted_todo + 1 where no = #value#
update tb_user set uncompleted_todo = uncompleted_todo - 1 where no = #value#
update tb_user set completed_todo = completed_todo + 1 where no = #value#
update tb_user set completed_todo = completed_todo - 1 where no = #value#
